content: Okay, in fairness to Robertson, not every game was televised and recorded then, so there was a much smaller pool of highlights to draw from. Also, while Russell Westbrook is an amazing athlete, if he got called for a travel every time he dribbled with his hand on the side of the ball, dribbled into a lane clogged with defenders due to the lack of a three point line, got handchecked constantly, and got called for travels, his highlight reel would look a lot different.
